TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceView extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceView

summary.span: 支持 控件并提供一个接口，使数据绑定控件可以执行 LINQ 数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于通过数据绑定控件，而不是作为页面代码中的可编程对象使用。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 页面开发人员通常使用控件与数据进行交互。Page developers typically use the control to interact with data. ASP.NET 数据源控件包含一个或多个数据源视图对象所表示的数据列表。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 类用于扩展类。The class extends the class. 它定义的功能与其相关联，并且它实现了数据源控件的基本数据功能控件。It defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 类实现，[更新]()，[插入]()，以及[删除]()操作。The class implements the , [Update](), [Insert](), and [Delete]() operations. 它还实现了排序、 筛选和管理保留在视图状态的设置。It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 尽管对象不直接公开到页面开发人员，可以通过访问其属性和方法的许多控件。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the control. 控件实现的以下数据检索方法和事件，并将其公开到页面开发人员和其他调用方通过关联控件：The control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated control: - 属性。The property. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. 您可以检索与数据进行排序控件通过添加`OrderBy`子句。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an `OrderBy` clause. 你可以提供的排序表达式通过设置实例的属性对象传递给方法。You can provide a sort expression for the instance by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 语法属性是相同的语法属性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 控件实现接口并使用视图状态来跟踪跨页请求其状态。The control implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 实现属性和， ，和提供方法来启用该控件的视图状态跟踪。Implementations of the property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 初始化的新实例类，设置指定控件作为当前视图的所有者。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified control as the owner of the current view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将调用构造函数[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法以返回具有指定的数据源视图的新实例`name`参数。The constructor is called by the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 只有一个对象与之关联控件一次。Only one object is associated with a control at a time. 名称对象始终是`DefaultView`，尽管此命名限制规定控制，无法由控件。The name of the object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not by the control. 您可以重写[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法，以支持使用不同的命名约定的视图。You can override the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to support views that use a different naming convention. 由传递的实例`context`参数由数据源视图来访问参数集合。The instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`如果属性设置为`true`。The property returns `true` if the property is set to `true`. 但是，如果关联的数据属性未设置或未正确设置，仍可能失败的删除操作。However, a delete operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件相关联的 对象是否支持对检索数据进行分页。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging of retrieved data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终支持分页，即使数据展示控件不使用分页。The object always supports paging even if the data presentation control does not use paging. 当[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()属性设置为`false`，您还可以手动页中的数据事件。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRetrieveTotalRowCount As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件相关联的 对象除支持检索数据外，是否还支持检索数据行的总数。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用可分页若要确定如何呈现分页控件的行的总数。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 例如，此值用于确定多少个数字页导航按钮中呈现控件页导航。For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如果[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()属性设置为`false`，则必须手动设置的总行数事件。If the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终支持排序，即使数据展示控件不使用排序。The object always supports sorting even if data presentation control does not use sorting. 当[LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort]()属性设置为`false`，你可以手动对中的数据进行排序事件。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort]() property is set to `false`, you can manually sort the data in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). `LoadViewState`方法将还原的视图状态信息对象从保存的上一个页请求方法。The `LoadViewState` method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当您重写方法在派生类中，请确保您调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override the method in a derived class, make sure that you call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 当您重写方法在派生类中，请确保您调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override the method in a derived class, make sure that you call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 将更改的视图状态保存自页回发到服务器控件。

span.span: Saves the changes to view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含对 控件的视图状态所做更改的对象；如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the control's view state, or null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SaveViewState`方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The `SaveViewState` method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 这些值会自动添加到的服务器控件，这是实例属性的: System.Web.UI.StateBag > 类。These values are automatically added to the property of the server control, which is an instance of the :System.Web.UI.StateBag> class. 服务器控件随后会保存到一个字符串对象的服务器控件生存期的保存状态阶段后的值。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 在保存视图状态时，在服务器控件生存期的保存状态阶段呈现到 HTML 隐藏元素的浏览器之后保留的字符串对象。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle is rendered to the browser as an HTML hidden element. 当创建自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写提高效率`SaveViewState`方法并修改`ViewState`服务器控件的属性。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the `SaveViewState` method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).
